item.title: Post: How Mom stays creative
item.description: My mom, and her plans NOTO — the North Topeka Arts & Entertainment District — asked several artists a question in a Facebook post: What are you doing to stay creative during the COVID-19 outbreak? My mom — subliminal message: BUY HER ART — gave the best answer: Designing my post apocalyptic wardrobe, plotting world domination and baking cookies.
item.content:encoded:
My mom, and her plans

NOTO — the North Topeka Arts & Entertainment District — asked several artists a question in a Facebook post:

What are you doing to stay creative during the COVID-19 outbreak?

My mom — subliminal message: BUY HER ART — gave the best answer:

Designing my post apocalyptic wardrobe, plotting world domination and baking cookies.
